b           "python.exe ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\dev\bin\build.py $args"
g           "git $args"
j.root      "cd ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\$args"
j.build     "cd ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\build"
j.dev       "cd ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\dev\$args"
j.env       "cd ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\dev\env\$args"
j.sample    "cd ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\dev\sample\$args"
j.inc       "cd ${RAPID_VULKAN_ROOT}\inc\$args"
